alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 04 at 7:40AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Wakulla, central Gadsden, central Liberty and southwestern Leon Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 845 AM EST/745 AM CST/... At 740 AM EST/640 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Blountstown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quincy, Blountstown, Greensboro, Orange, Gretna, Bristol, Rock Bluff, Jewel Fire Tower, Littman, Brown House, Juniper, Douglas City, Abe Springs, Vilas, Hosford, Jensen Place, Central City, Red Hill, Clio and Santa Clara. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
